channel.title: Building Site on Liu Qiran
channel.description: Recent content in Building Site on Liu Qiran

item.title: Categorize my blog
item.description: The most important decision is changing categories. so I think it is also important to categorize my writings, I improved the classification of my categories in my blog. I can read and found my writing through multi-level categories, classify them and reflect efficiently. I also can discover everything I wrote before through categories, like time traveling, know myself.
